name: grocery
description: // As shop owner I want to view a list of all employees, which are older than 18 years, so that I know who is allowed to work on Sundays. // As shop owner I want the list of employees to be sorted by their name, so I can find employees easier. // As shop owner I want the list of employees to be capitalized, so I can read it better. // As shop owner I want the employees to be sorted by their names descending instead of ascending.
